mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANK (BANK_ID, MEMBER_ID, ITEM_ID, OPEN_DATE, BANK_PW, BALANCE) VALUES(#{bank_id}, #{member_id}, #{item_id}, SYSDATE, #{bank_pw}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT B.*, I.* FROM BANK B INNER JOIN ITEMS I ON B.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID WHERE B.BANK_ID = #{bank_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE BANK B SET BALANCE=BALANCE+ CASE WHEN BANK_ID=#{bank_id} THEN -#{difference} WHEN BANK_ID=#{account_u} THEN #{difference} ELSE 0 END WHERE BANK_ID IN(#{bank_id}, #{account_u})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANK_INFOS VALUES (#{bank_id}, SYSDATE, (SELECT BALANCE FROM BANK WHERE BANK_ID = #{bank_id}), -#{difference}, #{account_u})
INSERT INTO BANK_INFOS VALUES (#{account_u}, SYSDATE, (SELECT BALANCE FROM BANK WHERE BANK_ID = #{account_u}), #{difference}, #{bank_id})
